Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Lasting Hope Ministries
Reviews.Content: This phone was a replacement for me and I had trouble with the small size but that is not a problem with the phone but my eyes

Reviews.Title: Phone is locked
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Despite showing up in the unlocked section on Amazon, the phone is locked to AT&T;, and cannot be opened even using the code provided by their customer service.

Reviews.Title: Mala atencion
Reviews.Author: Hermilo Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: El teléfono no especifica que viene bloqueado y tuve que pagar para desbloquearlo tendiendo que comprar un codigo de desbloqueo, la atención del vendedor no fue agradable .  Mucho cuidado con los teléfonos que indican AT & T.

ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Atrix 4G No Contract AT&T Cell Phone
